venue.name: Boston Vegetarian Food Festival - Reggie Lewis Athletic Center

item.description:
http://www.bostonveg....

The Boston Vegetarian Food Festival offers lots of cool stuff - food samples, speakers, discount shopping, etc. Speakers include Dr. Michael Greger, Kenneth Williams (the world's first vegan body-building champion will be speaking on fitness and compassion), Peter Singer, and Isa Chandra Moskowitz (who will be giving away free cupcakes!)

We should use the Message Board to coordinate car-pooling and where to meet once there.

Ignore the Washington thing on the location. Meetup.com insisted I added a zip and I didn't have one. I made one up and apparently it's for Edwall, WA. Sorry.

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group
